summary.para: Creates an instance of the PlayToController object.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: A bitwise OR of flags from the enumeration.

param.name: ppSource
param.para: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Creates an instance of the PlayToSource object.

remarks.para: To get a pointer to this interface, call . The CLSID is CLSID_PlayToSourceClassFactory.
